name: Blood Ooze
description: The Blood Ooze is a large, amorphous creature that inflicts devastating necrotic damage while healing itself by draining life from its foes. Its body lacks distinct features but moves fluidly, capable of climbing surfaces with ease.
memorable: Its unique ability to heal itself by draining necrotic energy from attackers makes it a persistent threat in battle.
goals: To drain the life force from its enemies and sustain itself in combat.
relations: May be encountered in lairs with other oozes or in places where blood is spilled.
environment: Commonly found in damp, dark areas or where there is a high concentration of blood.
strengths: Immunities to multiple damage types and conditions, combined with its ability to heal itself through damage dealt.
weaknesses: Very low Dexterity makes it vulnerable to ranged attacks and dexterous foes.
attacks: Pseudopod attack inflicts bludgeoning and additional necrotic damage, while allowing it to heal itself.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Drain ability enables the ooze to regain temporary hit points while damaging attackers.
senses: Blindsight up to 60 feet allows it to detect creatures without relying on sight.
skills: The ooze is highly resilient to damage due to its immunities against acid, fire, necrotic, and slashing damage.
additional_information: Can move through spaces as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
Can climb difficult surfaces and ceilings without issue.
Takes no damage from conditions affecting its senses and status effects.
Regains temporary hit points from necrotic damage dealt to others.
Ceiling navigation allows it to ambush from unconventional angles.
test_queries: large ooze enemy with healing ability
